# SYNOPSIS PLOTS: TYPE A SPECIES {#sec:synopsis-plots-A}

This section contains the main species-by-species data visualizations. Each
species is shown on two pages with the same layout used throughout. See Section
\@ref(sec:plot-descriptions) for detailed figure captions. The species are
ordered according to DFO species codes. The table of contents at the beginning
of the document includes links to the various species pages in order of species
codes, and Section (\@ref(sec:common-name-index)) and Section
(\@ref(sec:scientific-name-index)) provide links to the various pages sorted by
common name alphabetically and scientific name alphabetically, respectively.
